input_args.text: 'The Mother Of All October Surprises---Why The House Of Cards Will Now Come Tumbling Down By David Stockman.   FBI Director Comey\'s Friday afternoon letter to Congress about new email evidence was a lot more than a "bombshell". It was the equivalent of an election-cycle DEFCON 1. That\'s because Comey has to be a desperate man doing the very last thing imaginable. To wit, blowing up the establishment which he has obeisantly served for the last three decades.  '
